source_objects.title: Project Management
source_objects.description: Master Project Management with courses on: PMI RMP, PRINCE Foundation certification, software project management, CBAP, project planning and execution.

items.headline: PMP Exam Prep Seminar - Earn 35 PDUs by completing the entire PMP course
objectives_summary: Earn 35 PDUs/Contact Hours by completing the entire course
You will get all the resources you need to pass the PMI PMP certification exam.
You will earn 35 exam contact hours as required by PMI

items.title: Agile Crash Course: Agile Project Management; Agile Delivery

visible_instructors.title: Mauricio Rubio - Agile Guru & Founder of AgileKB | AgileLee & Ureducation
visible_instructors.display_name: Mauricio Rubio - Agile Guru & Founder of AgileKB | AgileLee & Ureducation
visible_instructors.job_title: Serial entrepreneur, techie, life hacker, expert PM & MBA
visible_instructors.name: Mauricio

items.headline: Get Agile Certified & Learn about the key and most important concepts and tools of Agile Project Management (Scrum)
objectives_summary: You will become Agile certified (you will receive a certificate upon completion).
You will learn the key concepts of Agile Development, Agile Project Delivery and Agile Project Management.
You will learn the meaning of user stories, daily stand-ups, retrospectives and kanban boards.

items.headline: Project Management: Growing a Successful Career as a Project Manager
objectives_summary: Compare and contrast the project management process groups
Explain what a project is (and is not)
Explain how to initiate a project

items.title: CAPM Exam Prep Seminar - PMBOK Guide, Sixth Edition

visible_instructors.title: Joseph Phillips
visible_instructors.job_title: PMP, PMI-ACP, Project+, ITIL, PSM I, CTT+
visible_instructors.name: Joseph

items.headline: Pass the CAPM and Earn 25 Contact Hours to Qualify for the CAPM Exam
objectives_summary: You will get all the resources you need to pass the PMI CAPM certification exam.
You will earn 25 exam contact hours from a PMI Registered Education Provider.
You will be able to discuss the PMBOK Guide 6th edition with confidence.

items.title: The Project Management Course: Beginner to PROject Manager

visible_instructors.title: 365 Careers
visible_instructors.job_title: Creating opportunities for Business & Finance students

items.headline: The Complete Course for becoming a Successful Project Manager
objectives_summary: Gain the Project Management knowledge and skills, needed to manage an entire project on your own
Perform a complete Case Study of a Project, from the beginning until its end, observing real-life project scenarios
Receive 15+ Project Management templates and practical documents to help you structure and manage projects

items.title: PMP Exam Prep Project Management Professional Certification
items.headline: PMP Certification 2021 - Get 35 PDUs - Project Management Professional - New PMP Exam Prep Training -PMBOK - Pmp Course
objectives_summary: Earn 35 PDU/Contact Hours Certificate
Pass the New PMP 2021 Exam easily on your first try
High Quality Videos and Realistic Practice Exams that cover the entire syllabus

items.title: PMP Certification Exam Prep Course 35 PDU Contact Hours/PDU
items.headline: Get your PMP Certification with this course. Fully updated for the 2021 PMP Exam
objectives_summary: Students will learn to pass the PMP Certification Exam on the first try.
35 Contract Hours/PDU Certificate form A PMI Registered Education Provider
Steps to fill out the PMP application

items.headline: Pass the PMI-ACP Exam based on PMBOK Guide 6: Everything You Need to Pass the PMI-ACP
objectives_summary: Qualify for the PMI-ACP Certification Exam
Build an Agile Mindset
Identify characteristics of value-driven projects

items.title: Agile Business Analysis
items.headline: Developing the analysis maturity and confidence you need... to deliver products in an agile way...
objectives_summary: Understand how Agile works and why it's such a big deal
Understand your role on the agile team
Write effective user stories and acceptance criteria

items.title: Deeply Practical Project Management (Earn 16 PDUs)
items.headline: How to apply the PMI project management best practices in the simplest, most practical way, with a "magical" example!
objectives_summary: How to get stakeholder buy-in and senior management support at the beginning of your project, and maintain it throughout.
The three fundamental messages of the PM triple constraint, how they inter-relate, and how they affect risk.
How to plan your project VERY efficiently, so you know the scope, schedule, budget, and risks before you start.

items.title: Project Management Fundamentals
items.headline: Practical Project Management worked example using Gantt Charts, PMI, PMP, APM
objectives_summary: Feel confident applying Project Management theory to your real life project
Be able to manage a successful project even with zero experience in that industry
Build a Gantt chart using no specialist software (just Excel and Post-it Notes)

items.title: Project Management: Master Project Management - PMP/PMI
items.headline: Master Project Management using this practical certification course
objectives_summary: Avoid the top ten mistakes people make in projects
Be able to manage a successful project even with zero experience in that industry
Learn how to make a Gantt Chart and a PERT diagram with ease

items.title: Microsoft Excel for Project Management  - Earn 5 PDUs

visible_instructors.title: Joseph Phillips
visible_instructors.job_title: PMP, PMI-ACP, Project+, ITIL, PSM I, CTT+

items.headline: Mastering Microsoft Excel for Project Management: Controlling, Tracking, and Reporting
objectives_summary: Design reports for your stakeholders
Create a dashboard with some common project management requirements
Improve project communications with charts

items.headline: Develop an Adaptive, High-Performance Agile Approach Based on a Deeper Understanding of Agile Principles and Values
objectives_summary: Develop a deeper understanding of the principles and values behind Agile and Scrum to create high performance Agile teams and to apply Agile more effectively to a much broader range of projects and business environments
Develop the knowledge and skills to lead, mentor, and coach Agile project teams based on an in-depth understanding of understanding of Agile and Scrum values, principles, and practices
